verses.text: Now these \add are\add* the \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* which thou shalt \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them.

If thou \w buy|strong="H7069"\w* an \w Hebrew|strong="H5680"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* he shall \w serve|strong="H5647"\w*: and in the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* he shall go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w free|strong="H2670"\w* for \w nothing|strong="H2600"\w*.

If he came \w in|strong="H0935"\w* by \w himself|strong="H1610"\w*, he shall go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* by \w himself|strong="H1610"\w*: if he were \w married|strong="H1167"\w*, then his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* shall go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* with him.\f + \fr 21.3 \ft by himself: Heb. with his body\f*

If his \w master|strong="H0113"\w* have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* him a \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, and she have \w born|strong="H3205"\w* him \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* or \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*; the \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* and her \w children|strong="H3206"\w* shall be her \w master’s|strong="H0113"\w*, and he shall go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* by \w himself|strong="H1610"\w*.

And if the \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* shall \w plainly|strong="H0559"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, I \w love|strong="H0157"\w* my \w master|strong="H0113"\w*, my \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, and my \w children|strong="H1121"\w*; I will not go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w free|strong="H2670"\w*:\f + \fr 21.5 \ft shall…: Heb. saying shall say\f*

Then his \w master|strong="H0113"\w* shall \w bring|strong="H5066"\w* him unto the \w judges|strong="H0430"\w*; he shall also \w bring|strong="H5066"\w* him to the \w door|strong="H1817"\w*, or unto the door \w post|strong="H4201"\w*; and his \w master|strong="H0113"\w* shall \w bore|strong="H7527"\w* his \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* through with an \w aul|strong="H4836"\w*; and he shall \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* him for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

¶ And if a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* his \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* to be a \w maidservant|strong="H0519"\w*, she shall not go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* as the \w menservants|strong="H5650"\w* \w do|strong="H3318"\w*.

If she \w please|strong="H7451"\w* not her \w master|strong="H0113"\w*, who hath \w betrothed|strong="H3259"\w* her to himself, then shall he let her be \w redeemed|strong="H6299"\w*: to \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* her unto a \w strange|strong="H5237"\w* \w nation|strong="H5971"\w* he shall have no \w power|strong="H4910"\w*, seeing he hath dealt \w deceitfully|strong="H0898"\w* with her.\f + \fr 21.8 \ft please…: Heb. be evil in the eyes of, etc\f*

And if he have \w betrothed|strong="H3259"\w* her unto his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, he shall \w deal|strong="H6213"\w* with her after the \w manner|strong="H4941"\w* of \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*.

If he \w take|strong="H3947"\w* him \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \add wife;\add* her \w food|strong="H7607"\w*, her \w raiment|strong="H3682"\w*, and her duty of \w marriage|strong="H5772"\w*, shall he not \w diminish|strong="H1639"\w*.
And if he \w do|strong="H6213"\w* not these \w three|strong="H7969"\w* unto her, then shall she go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w free|strong="H2600"\w* without \w money|strong="H3701"\w*.
¶ He that \w smiteth|strong="H5221"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, so that he \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, shall be \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.

And if a man lie not in \w wait|strong="H6658"\w*, but \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w deliver|strong="H0579"\w* \add him\add* into his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*; then I will \w appoint|strong="H7760"\w* thee a \w place|strong="H4725"\w* whither he shall \w flee|strong="H5127"\w*.

But if a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* come \w presumptuously|strong="H2102"\w* upon his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*, to \w slay|strong="H2026"\w* him with \w guile|strong="H6195"\w*; thou shalt \w take|strong="H3947"\w* him from mine \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, that he may \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.
¶ And he that \w smiteth|strong="H5221"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, or his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, shall be \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.

¶ And he that \w stealeth|strong="H1589"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, and \w selleth|strong="H4376"\w* him, or if he be \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, he shall \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.

¶ And he that \w curseth|strong="H7043"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, or his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, shall \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.\f + \fr 21.17 \ft curseth: or, revileth\f*

¶ And if \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w strive|strong="H7378"\w* together, and \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* \w another|strong="H7453"\w* with a \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* with \add his\add* \w fist|strong="H0106"\w*, and he \w die|strong="H4191"\w* not, but \w keepeth|strong="H5307"\w* \add his\add* \w bed|strong="H4904"\w*:\f + \fr 21.18 \ft another: or, his neighbour\f*

If he rise \w again|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w abroad|strong="H2351"\w* upon his \w staff|strong="H4938"\w*, then shall he that \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* \add him\add* be \w quit|strong="H5352"\w*: only he shall \w pay|strong="H5414"\w* \add for\add* the loss of his \w time|strong="H7674"\w*, and shall cause \add him\add* to be \w thoroughly|strong="H7495"\w* \w healed|strong="H7495"\w*.\f + \fr 21.19 \ft the loss…: Heb. his ceasing\f*

¶ And if a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* his \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, or his \w maid|strong="H0519"\w*, with a \w rod|strong="H7626"\w*, and he \w die|strong="H4191"\w* under his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*; he shall be \w surely|strong="H5358"\w* \w punished|strong="H5358"\w*.\f + \fr 21.20 \ft punished: Heb. avenged\f*

\w Notwithstanding|strong="H0389"\w*, if he \w continue|strong="H5975"\w* a \w day|strong="H3117"\w* or \w two|strong="H8147"\w*, he shall not be \w punished|strong="H5358"\w*: for he \add is\add* his \w money|strong="H3701"\w*.

¶ If \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w strive|strong="H5327"\w*, and \w hurt|strong="H5062"\w* a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* with \w child|strong="H2030"\w*, so that her \w fruit|strong="H3206"\w* \w depart|strong="H3318"\w* \add from her\add*, and yet no mischief \w follow|strong="H0611"\w*: he shall be \w surely|strong="H6064"\w* \w punished|strong="H6064"\w*, according as the \w woman’s|strong="H0802"\w* \w husband|strong="H1167"\w* will \w lay|strong="H7896"\w* upon him; and he shall \w pay|strong="H5414"\w* as the \w judges|strong="H6414"\w* \add determine\add*.
And if \add any\add* mischief \w follow|strong="H0611"\w*, then thou shalt \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* for \w life|strong="H5315"\w*,

\w Eye|strong="H5869"\w* for \w eye|strong="H5869"\w*, \w tooth|strong="H8127"\w* for \w tooth|strong="H8127"\w*, \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* for \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* for \w foot|strong="H7272"\w*,
\w Burning|strong="H3555"\w* for \w burning|strong="H3555"\w*, \w wound|strong="H6482"\w* for \w wound|strong="H6482"\w*, \w stripe|strong="H2250"\w* for \w stripe|strong="H2250"\w*.

¶ And if a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* the \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* of his \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, or the \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* of his \w maid|strong="H0519"\w*, that it \w perish|strong="H7843"\w*; he shall let him \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w free|strong="H2670"\w* \w for|strong="H8478"\w* his \w eye’s|strong="H5869"\w* sake.

And if he \w smite|strong="H5307"\w* out his \w manservant’s|strong="H5650"\w* \w tooth|strong="H8127"\w*, or his \w maidservant’s|strong="H0519"\w* \w tooth|strong="H8127"\w*; he shall let him \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w free|strong="H2670"\w* for his \w tooth’s|strong="H8127"\w* sake.

¶ If an \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* \w gore|strong="H5055"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* or a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, that they \w die|strong="H4191"\w*: then the \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* shall be \w surely|strong="H5619"\w* \w stoned|strong="H5619"\w*, and his \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* shall not be \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*; but the \w owner|strong="H1167"\w* of the \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* \add shall be\add* \w quit|strong="H5355"\w*.

But if the \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* were wont to push with his \w horn|strong="H5056"\w* in time \w past|strong="H8543"\w*, and it hath been \w testified|strong="H5749"\w* to his \w owner|strong="H1167"\w*, and he hath not \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* him in, but that he hath \w killed|strong="H4191"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* or a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*; the \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* shall be \w stoned|strong="H5619"\w*, and his \w owner|strong="H1167"\w* also shall be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.

If there be \w laid|strong="H7896"\w* on him a sum of \w money|strong="H3724"\w*, then he shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* for the \w ransom|strong="H6306"\w* of his \w life|strong="H5315"\w* whatsoever is \w laid|strong="H7896"\w* upon him.

Whether he have \w gored|strong="H5055"\w* a \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* have \w gored|strong="H5055"\w* a \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, according to this \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* shall it be \w done|strong="H6213"\w* unto him.

If the \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* shall \w push|strong="H5055"\w* a \w manservant|strong="H5650"\w* or a \w maidservant|strong="H0519"\w*; he shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto their \w master|strong="H0113"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and the \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* shall be \w stoned|strong="H5619"\w*.

¶ And if a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall \w open|strong="H6605"\w* a \w pit|strong="H0953"\w*, or if a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall \w dig|strong="H3738"\w* a \w pit|strong="H0953"\w*, and not \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* it, and an \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* or an \w ass|strong="H2543"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* therein;

The \w owner|strong="H1167"\w* of the \w pit|strong="H0953"\w* shall make \add it\add* \w good|strong="H7999"\w*, \add and\add* \w give|strong="H7725"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* unto the \w owner|strong="H1167"\w* of them; and the \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \add beast\add* shall be his.

¶ And if one \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w* \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* \w hurt|strong="H5062"\w* \w another’s|strong="H7453"\w*, that he \w die|strong="H4191"\w*; then they shall \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* the \w live|strong="H2416"\w* \w ox|strong="H7794"\w*, and \w divide|strong="H2673"\w* the \w money|strong="H3701"\w* of it; and the \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \add ox\add* also they shall \w divide|strong="H2673"\w*.

Or if it be \w known|strong="H3045"\w* that the \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* hath used to \w push|strong="H5056"\w* in time \w past|strong="H8543"\w*, and his \w owner|strong="H1167"\w* hath not \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* him in; he shall \w surely|strong="H7999"\w* \w pay|strong="H7999"\w* \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* for \w ox|strong="H7794"\w*; and the \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* shall be his own.
